short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your virtual chit box for receiving messages from Bhagwan Sri Sathya Sai Baba.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The "Talk to Swami" extension lets you ask Bhagawan Sri Sathya Sai Baba a question. When you click a button, a message shows up on the screen, which you can think of as Swami's response to your question. Thinking about that message helps you find an answer to your question.
